date: "2023-11-04"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
sX_data <- read.csv(here("data/StockX-Data-Contest-2019-3.csv"))
```

```{r}
sX_data$Order.Date <- mdy(sX_data$Order.Date)
sX_data$Release.Date <- mdy(sX_data$Release.Date)

sX_data$Sale.Price <- gsub("\\$|\\,", "", sX_data$Sale.Price)
sX_data$Retail.Price <- gsub("\\$|\\,", "", sX_data$Retail.Price)

sX_data$Sale.Price <- as.numeric(sX_data$Sale.Price)
sX_data$Retail.Price <- as.numeric(sX_data$Retail.Price)

```

```{r}
write_csv(sX_data, "data/sX_data.csv")
```
